description: Germany fears President Trump's plan to cut 9,500 US troops will weaken transatlantic security.
title: Why Trump's plan to withdraw US troops has dismayed Germany
title_page: Why Trump's plan to withdraw US troops has dismayed Germany - BBC News
maintext: Germans, he said, "have developed a tendency of thinking of themselves as morally superior because we are not waging aggressive wars, because we're always wagging our finger and saying let's be on the good side. Being on the good side in a bad world requires also to be able to deter, to defend if necessary and help defend others".
